mapper.select: SELECT wr_materialspay_number AS wrMaterialspayNumber, wr_number AS wrNumber, e_materialspay_number AS eMaterialspayNumber, wr_materialspay_quantity AS wrMaterialspayQuantity, wr_materialspay_unitcost AS wrMaterialspayUnitcost FROM sp_wr_materialspay WHERE wr_number = #{wrMaterialspayNumber}

SELECT sp_wr_materialspay.wr_materialspay_number, sp_wr.wr_number, sp_wr.wr_totalarea, sp_wr.wr_reworkarea, sp_e_materialspay.e_materialspay_number, sp_e_materialspay.e_materialspay_unitcost, sp_e_materialspay.e_materialspay_use, sp_e_materialspay.e_materialspay_secret, sp_wr_materialspay.wr_materialspay_quantity, sp_wr_materialspay.wr_materialspay_unitcost, sp_materials_cate.materials_name, sp_materials_cate.materials_unit FROM sp_wr_materialspay JOIN sp_wr ON sp_wr.wr_number = sp_wr_materialspay.wr_number JOIN sp_e_materialspay ON sp_e_materialspay.e_materialspay_number = sp_wr_materialspay.e_materialspay_number JOIN sp_materials_cate ON sp_e_materialspay.materials_number = sp_materials_cate.materials_number WHERE sp_wr.wr_number = #{wrNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sp_wr_materialspay ( wr_number, e_materialspay_number, wr_materialspay_quantity, wr_materialspay_unitcost ) VALUES ( #{ppWoResult.wrNumber}, #{woMaterialsPay.eMaterialspayNumber}, #{wrMaterialspayQuantity}, #{wrMaterialspayUnitcost} )
